mapper.sql: id, wallet_id, bankcard_one, bankcard_oneSign, bankcardname_one, bankcard_two, bankcard_twoSign, bankcardname_two, bankcard_three, bankcard_threeSign, bankcardname_three, wallet_money, wallet_password, realname, createtime, updatetime
mapper.insert: insert into user_wallet (wallet_id, bankcard_one, bankcard_oneSign, bankcardname_one, bankcard_two, bankcard_twoSign, bankcardname_two, bankcard_three, bankcard_threeSign, bankcardname_three, wallet_money, wallet_password, realname, createtime, updatetime ) values (#{walletId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{bankcardOne,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankcardOnesign,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bankcardnameOne,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankcardTwo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankcardTwosign,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bankcardnameTwo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankcardThree,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankcardThreesign,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bankcardnameThree,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{walletMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{walletPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.select:
select wallet_password from user_wallet where 1=1
and wallet_id=#{walletId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select realname from user_wallet where 1=1
and wallet_id=#{walletId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select wallet_money from user_wallet where 1=1
and wallet_id=#{walletId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select bankcard_one, bankcard_two, bankcard_three from user_wallet where 1=1
and wallet_id=#{walletId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.update:
update user_wallet set bankcard_one=#{updatedBankcardOne,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bankcardname_one=#{updatedBankcardnameOne,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bankcard_oneSign=1 where 1=1
and wallet_id=#{walletId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update user_wallet set bankcard_two=#{updatedBankcardTwo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},bankcardname_two=#{updatedBankcardnameTwo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bankcard_twoSign=1 where 1=1
and wallet_id=#{walletId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update user_wallet set bankcard_three=#{updatedBankcardThree,jdbcType=VARCHAR},bankcardname_three=#{updatedBankcardnameThree,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bankcard_threeSign=1 where 1=1
and wallet_id=#{walletId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select bankcardname_one, bankcardname_two, bankcardname_three from user_wallet where 1=1
and wallet_id=#{walletId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select bankcard_oneSign, bankcard_twoSign, bankcard_threeSign from user_wallet where 1=1
and wallet_id=#{walletId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.update:
update user_wallet set bankcard_one=null, bankcardname_one=null, bankcard_oneSign=0 where 1=1
and wallet_id=#{walletId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update user_wallet set bankcard_two=null, bankcardname_two=null, bankcard_twoSign=0 where 1=1
and wallet_id=#{walletId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update user_wallet set bankcard_three=null, bankcardname_three=null, bankcard_threeSign=0 where 1=1
and wallet_id=#{walletId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
